config.title: Miriam Valdes
config.description: Hi! I am Miriam, and I am an economist with a computer science background. I am very excited about joining the Justia Mexico team. I have two children, and I like to spend time with my family and enjoy reading, solving riddles, dancing, doing outside activities, and yoga. I also like to go shopping.

Whenever I have free time, I like to watch videos to develop my programming skills and maybe do some late-night gaming. I live by the "Nothing is impossible" motto.

config.title: Daniel Gomez
config.description: Hello, my name is Daniel Gómez. I’m 21 years old, and I’m from Fresnillo, Zacatecas. I’m about to graduate as a Computer Systems Engineer. I look forward to beginning my journey in Justia and working with you.
